abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Taste of Samarkand restaurant in Middle Village, Queens.

headline.print_headline: A Silk Road Oasis in Queens
headline.main: Taste of Samarkand Is a Silk Road Oasis in Queens

snippet: The kosher Uzbek restaurant, which opened last August, upholds Uzbek food traditions.
lead_paragraph: The kosher Uzbek restaurant, which opened last August, upholds Uzbek food traditions.
